title: Soldier

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- At night, use a vest to gain basic defense for the night. If you block an attack this way, you learn of who attacked you, and grab your gun and four bullets. 2 uses.
- At night, if you have a gun you may shoot a player, consuming a bullet. If you shoot a fellow Countryfolk, you lose 2 additional bullets.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can multitask wearing a vest and shooting a player.
- Blocking an attack while you already have a gun will still grant you four bullets.

fields.name: Background:
fields.value: - On day 3, you 1 charge of Alert. When used at night, basic attack all players who visit you and gain basic defense for the night.
